name: Spark Logix Studio
description: Spark Logix Studios is a well-regarded, digital media company specializing in SEO, WordPress, and graphic design. We provide amazing project communication support & reporting. Our specialties include WordPress website design & development, theme developer, and plugin developer; pay per click (for Google & Facebook); search engine optimization; digital media marketing; animated videos; and eCommerce web design and development (throught Magento).
